item.description:
Hi everyone!  I would like to take the opportunity to let you know that I am very excited to be your new assistant organizer!  This is the first meetup I've planned for the group, and I will be scheduling meetups about every two weeks.  I would love to meet all of you! Get ready to have some fun!!

These are great venues to meet & greet over some cocktails. 6B hosts a 90's night on Friday, so there will probably be some dancing as well! Feel free to bring a friend!

DETAILS: Come hang out at 21st Amendment (150 Bowdoin St, across the street from the statehouse) for about an hour to so we can gather as a group before we head over to 6B (6 Beacon St), directly around the corner, for cocktails & lounging! 6B can get busy, and if you arrive late and can't find the group call or text my cell (508-340-8635). Both venues have NO COVER!

Dress code for the lounge is upscale casual. Closest T stops are Park St, Government Center and State. Again, please call or email me with any questions!

Hope to see you there!! -Ashley
item.how_to_find_us: My profile picture should give you an idea of who to look for, and my cell is 508-340-8635.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Drinks at 21st Amendment then let's lounge at 6B! - Friday, February 25th
